item.title: Connect Oracle 10g Database use JDBC
item.description: install jayDeBeApi & jpype $ sudo apt-get install python-setuptools $ sudo easy_install JayDeBeApi $ sudo easy_install jpype Download Oracle JDBC Drivers ojdbc6.jar to local. import jpype import jaydebeapi jHome = jpype.getDefaultJVMPath() print jHome jpype.startJVM(jHome, '-Djava.class.path=/path/to/ojdbc6.jar') conn = jaydebeapi.connect('oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver', 'jdbc:oracle:thin:user/password@DB_HOST_IP:1521:DB_NAME') curs = conn.cursor() curs.execute("select * from ACCOUNT") acc = curs.fetchall() curs.close() conn.close() jpype.shutdownJVM() print acc Reference: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/JayDeBeApi http://wiki.python.org/moin/Oracle
